channel.title: We Talk Nerd Podcast
channel.description: Tune in as Brandon, Andrew and Rob talk about current nerd culture. Every week we dive into subjects like games, movies, tv and more!
channel.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
channel.itunes:keywords: Gaming, Movies, TV, News, Nerd, Culture

item.title: Fortnite... Mobile Edition
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: Lots of cool Nintendo announcements and updates to our favorite battle royal games. Like Fortnite releasing on iOS!
item.itunes:subtitle: Lots of cool Nintendo announcements and updates to our favorite battle royal games. Like Fortnite releasing on iOS!
item.description: Lots of cool Nintendo announcements and updates to our favorite battle royal games. Like Fortnite releasing on iOS!

item.title: Sea of Thieves Open Beta? Maybe
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We bring you the latest in gaming news as well as speculation on if Sea of Thieves will be a public beta this weekend. With some movie and tv news and a review for the Hulu show Future Man, and 20 questions is back.
item.itunes:subtitle: We bring you the latest in gaming news as well as speculation on if Sea of Thieves will be a public beta this weekend. With some movie and tv news and a review for the Hulu show Future Man, and 20 questions is back.
item.description: We bring you the latest in gaming news as well as speculation on if Sea of Thieves will be a public beta this weekend. With some movie and tv news and a review for the Hulu show Future Man, and 20 questions is back.

item.title: We Jump Into The Breach
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We have a couple reviews for some new shows and movies, as well as the latest game "Into the Breach". We have some news to go over as well.
item.itunes:subtitle: We have a couple reviews for some new shows and movies, as well as the latest game "Into the Breach". We have some news to go over as well.
item.description: We have a couple reviews for some new shows and movies, as well as the latest game "Into the Breach". We have some news to go over as well.

item.title: Black Panther Topping Charts!
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We talk about the biggest movie in the world right now... Black Panther. We also talk about some Netflix shows and the latest in gaming news.
item.itunes:subtitle: We talk about the biggest movie in the world right now... Black Panther. We also talk about some Netflix shows and the latest in gaming news.
item.description: We talk about the biggest movie in the world right now... Black Panther. We also talk about some Netflix shows and the latest in gaming news.

item.title: Sea of Thieves Sprung a Leak
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We discuses the new RPG sweeping Twitch, as well as some Sea of Thieves leaks and Destiny updates. We review Altered Carbon and prepare for our review of Black Panther next week!
item.itunes:subtitle: We discuses the new RPG sweeping Twitch, as well as some Sea of Thieves leaks and Destiny updates. We review Altered Carbon and prepare for our review of Black Panther next week!
item.description: We discuses the new RPG sweeping Twitch, as well as some Sea of Thieves leaks and Destiny updates. We review Altered Carbon and prepare for our review of Black Panther next week!

item.title: Let's Talk Altered Carbon
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We got trailer load after trailer load of movies... thanks Super Bowl! We also dive into the new Netflix series, Altered Carbon.
item.itunes:subtitle: We got trailer load after trailer load of movies... thanks Super Bowl! We also dive into the new Netflix series, Altered Carbon.
item.description: We got trailer load after trailer load of movies... thanks Super Bowl! We also dive into the new Netflix series, Altered Carbon.

item.title: The Allied Races Join the Fight for Azeroth
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: This week we got the new allied races in WoW. Andrew discusses the roadmap to Destiny 2, and Rob gives us some comic talk!
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we got the new allied races in WoW. Andrew discusses the roadmap to Destiny 2, and Rob gives us some comic talk!
item.description: This week we got the new allied races in WoW. Andrew discusses the roadmap to Destiny 2, and Rob gives us some comic talk!

item.title: Setting Sail on a Sea of Thieves!
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: This week we set sails on the open waters of Sea of Thieves... and some of us play with submarines. We have a Godzilla review as well as gaming news!

item.title: Nintendo Labo... Cardboard of the Future!
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: Exciting news from Nintendo this past week! We got new games coming and something that surprised us all! We dive into the WoW patch and talk about the latest updates from Bungie!
